stories.fantasy_headline: Stargazers Discover Hidden Spirit Guiding the Crimson Giant
stories.fantasy_story: Celestial Wizards have long pondered the Crimson Giant's shifting light. Now, their enchanted spyglasses reveal a small companion spirit, secretly guiding celestial winds through its vast aura. This discovery was made possible by eight years of patient observation with powerful arcane artifacts.

stories.original_headline: Astronomers find a ghost galaxy made of dark matter
stories.original_summary: Hubble has revealed a strange cosmic object called Cloud-9, a dark matter–dominated cloud with no stars at all. stories.fantasy_headline: Stargazers Uncover a Shadow Realm of Unlit Stars
stories.fantasy_story: Through powerful enchanted spyglasses, Celestial Wizards have found Cloud-9, a strange ethereal cloud made of void-stuff with no stars within it. They believe it is a forgotten realm from the dawn of time that never bloomed. This confirms ancient scrolls speaking of realms that never lit up.

stories.fantasy_headline: Amazon Merchant's Guild Plans Vast New Emporium Near Orland Village
stories.fantasy_story: The Amazon Merchant's Guild aims to build a grand new trading hall, vast beyond imagining, near the bustling Orland Village. The local Council of Elders and Merchants have approved the guild's plans to clear a large tract of land for this immense market, promising a bounty of goods for all.
